titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the International Home Furnishings Market in High Point, North Carolina.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 4/19/2005--Introduced. Expresses support for the International Home Furnishings Market in High Point, North Carolina, and commends those who organize and participate in the Market. Recognizes the Market as a positive economic impact on North Carolina and vital to a region and State adversely affected by a decline in traditional manufacturing.
